data.text:
MLB Draft

—————

By The Associated Press

At Fort Worth, Texas

—————

All selections in the first 2 rounds, then Detroit Tigers, Milwaukee Brewers and Michigan- and Wisconsin-related picks for other rounds

—————

Sunday, July 14

—————

FIRST ROUND

1. Cleveland Guardians, Travis Bazzana, 2B, Oregon State.

2. Cincinnati Reds, Chase Burns, RPH, Wake Forest.

3. Colorado Rockies, Charlie Condon, OF, Georgia.

4. Oakland Athletics, Nick Kurtz, 1B, Wake Forest.

5. Chicago White Sox, Hagen Smith, LHP, Arkansas.

6. Kansas City Royals, Jac Caglianone, 1B/LHP, Florida.

7. St. Louis Cardinals, JJ Wetherholt, SS, West Virginia.

8. L.A. Angels, Christian Moore, 2B, Tennessee.

9. Pittsburgh Pirates, Konnor Griffin, SS, Jackson Prep School, Miss.

10. Washington Nationals, Seaver King, SS, Wake Forest.

—————

11. Detroit Tigers, Bryce Rainer, SS, Harvard-Westlake H.S., Calif.

—————

12. Boston Red Sox, Braden Montgomery, OF, Texas A&M.

13. San Francisco Giants, James Tibbs III, OF, Florida State.

14. Chicago Cubs, Cam Smith, 3B, Florida State.

15. Seattle Mariners, Jurrangelo Cijntje, P, Mississippi State.

16. Miami Marlins, PJ Morlando, OF, Summerville H.S., Calif.

—————

17. Milwaukee Brewers, Braylon Payne, OF, Elkins H.S., Texas.

—————

18. Tampa Bay Rays, Theo Gillen, OF, Westlake H.S., Texas.

23. L.A. Dodgers, Kellon Lindsey, SS, Hardee H.S., Fla.

—————

—————

28. Houston Astros, Walker Janek, C, Sam Houston.

29. Arizona Diamondbacks, Slade Caldwell, OF, Valley View H.S., Ariz.

30. Texas Rangers, Malcolm Moore, C, Stanford.

—————

Prospect Promotion Incentive Picks

31. Arizona Diamondbacks, Ryan Waldschmidt, OF, Kentucky.

32. Baltimore Orioles, Griff O’Ferrall, SS, Virginia.

—————

Compensation Picks

33. Minnesota Twins, Kyle DeBarge, SS, Louisiana Lafayette.

35. Arizona Diamondbacks, JD Dix, SS, Whitefish Bay H.S., Wis.

—————

MONDAY, JULY 15

—————

THIRD ROUND

85. Detroit Tigers, Josh Randall, RHP, San Diego.

93. Milwaukee Brewers, Jaron DeBerry, RHP, Dallas Baptist.

—————

FOURTH ROUND

112. Pittsburgh Pirates, Eddie Rynders, SS, Wisconsin Lutheran HS (Wis.).

114. Detroit Tigers, Michael Massey, RHP, Wake Forest.

123. Milwaukee Brewers, Marco Dinges, C, Florida St.

—————

FIFTH ROUND

147. Detroit Tigers, Jack Penney, RHP, Notre Dame.

156. Milwaukee Brewers, John Holobetz, RHP, Old Dominion.

—————

SIXTH ROUND

176. Detroit Tigers, Woody Hadeen, SS, UC-Irvine.

185. Milwaukee Brewers, Chandler Welch, RHP, Tulane.

—————

SEVENTH ROUND

206. Detroit Tigers, Jackson Strong, OF, Canisius College.

215. Milwaukee Brewers, Mason Molina, LHP, Arkansas.

—————

EIGHTH ROUND

236. Detroit Tigers, Ethan Sloan, LHP, Regis.

245. Milwaukee Brewers, Sam Garcia, LHP, Oklahoma St.

—————

NINTH ROUND

266. Detroit Tigers, Zach Swanson, RHP, Toutle Lake HS (Wash.).

275. Milwaukee Brewers, Griffin Tobias, RHP, Lake Central HS (Ind.).

—————

TENTH ROUND

296. Detroit Tigers, R.J. Sales, RHP, Toutle Lake HS (Wash.).

305. Milwaukee Brewers, Ethan Dorchies, RHP, Cary Grove HS (Ill.).

315. (last pick) Texas Rangers, Jake Jekielek, RHP, Northwood.
